body.p: Front cover pages are added as a result of applying the coverSection SectionDef under the following conditions:

ul.li: map: map element has @title attribute or child <title> element
bookmap: bookmap element contains child <booktitle> element

body.p: To apply a non-standard coverSection (for example, when using a single DITA map to describe products with very different cover designs) set the ant build parameter mmpdf:coverSection=name.
To suppress cover generation in the above cases, set mmpdf:includeCover=N

Back cover pages may be added to the PDF generated from a map or bookmap if and only if the ant build parameter mmpdf:includeBackCover is set to Y. In this case the backCoverSection SectionDef is applied to the end of the generated PDF.
